resources.string: Upkeep step - things stated to happen during upkeep, happen
Draw step - you draw a card
Precombat main phase - you can cast spells and play lands now
Start of combat step - last chance for your opponent to act before your creatures attack
Declare attackers step - select creatures to attack your opponent
Declare blockers step - your opponent selects creatures to block
Combat damage step - creatures deal damage
End of combat step - last chance for your opponent to act before your next main phase
Postcombat main phase - you can cast spells and play lands
End step - last chance for your opponent to act this turn
